meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2415.

td.p: Deborah Sager, a senior from Reston, Virginia (subtotal of $7,200)
Matt Zielenski, a junior from Broadview Heights, Ohio (subtotal of $24,000)
Susannah Batko-Yovino, a junior from Altoona, Pennsylvania (subtotal of $12,800)

tr.td: ASTRONOMY & SPACE
GAMES
AMERICANA
BIOGRAPHIES
VOCABULARY
FOOD POTPOURRI
